scripts.deps: npm run deps:server && npm run deps:client
scripts.start:server: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.start:client: cd client && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run start:server && npm run start:client
scripts.test:server: cd server && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:client: cd client && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.ci: npm run prepare && npm run deps
